Description.Name: Sample hardware abstraction for Avnet MT3620 SK
MainCoreHeaderFileTopContent: /* Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
// This file defines the mapping from the Avnet MT3620 Starter Kit (SK) to the
// 'sample hardware' abstraction used by the samples at https://github.com/Azure/azure-sphere-samples.
// Some peripherals are on-board on the Avnet MT3620 SK, while other peripherals must be attached externally if needed.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_LED_PWM_CHANNEL
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: Channel 1 for the PWM LED1 green. In the app manifest, it is only necessary to request the capability for the PWM Controller, SAMPLE_LED_PWM_CONTROLLER.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_POTENTIOMETER_ADC_CHANNEL
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: Connect external potentiometer to ADC controller 0, channel 1 using SOCKET1 AN. In the app manifest, it is only necessary to request the capability for the ADC Group Controller, SAMPLE_POTENTIOMETER_ADC_CONTROLLER.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_RGBLED_RED
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: User LED RED Channel.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_RGBLED_GREEN
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: User LED GREEN Channel.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_RGBLED_BLUE
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: User LED BLUE Channel.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_UART
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: Connect SOCKET1 RX (RX) to SOCKET1 TX (TX).

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_LSM6DS3_I2C
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: Connect external LSM6DS3 to I2C using SOCKET1, pin MISO (SDA) and pin MOSI (SCL).

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_LSM6DS3_SPI
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: Connect external LSM6DS3 to SPI using SOCKET1, pin MISO (MISO), pin SCK (SCLK), pin MOSI (MOSI) and SOCKET2 pin CS (CSB).

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_LSM6DS3_SPI_CS
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SPI Chip Select (CS) value "B". This is not a peripheral identifier, and so has no meaning in an app manifest.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_NRF52_RESET
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: Connect external reset signal using SOCKET1: RX.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_NRF52_DFU
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: Connect external dfu signal using SOCKET1: TX.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_NRF52_UART
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: Connect external NRF52 UART using SOCKET1: "MISO" (RX), "SCK" (TX), "CS" (CTS), and "MOSI" (RTS).

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_DEVICE_STATUS_LED
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: Connect external red LED using SOCKET1, pin PWM.

Peripherals.Name: SAMPLE_PENDING_UPDATE_LED
Peripherals.Comment: MT3620 SK: Connect external blue LED using SOCKET1, pin PWM2.
